io.dazraf.vertx.futures.tuple

Class Tuple<T extends Tuple>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.dazraf.vertx.futures.tuple.Tuple<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type that is derived from this class.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Tuple2, Tuple3, Tuple4

    public abstract class Tuple<T extends Tuple>
extends Object
    Base class for all Tuples. Essentially here to ensure type safety in classes such as FutureProcessor. In addition provides the factory functions for creating Tuples from futures or intrinsic values.

        public static <T1,T2> io.vertx.core.Future<Tuple2<T1,T2>> all(io.vertx.core.Future<T1> f1,
                                                              io.vertx.core.Future<T2> f2)
        Given two futures, of types T1 and T2 respectively, returns a Future of Tuple2 for the respective types T1 and T2
        Type Parameters:
        T1 - The parameterised type of the Future f1
        T2 - The parameterised type of the Future f2
        Parameters:
        f1 - The first future of type T1. The future may be complete or not
        f2 - The second future of type T2. The future may be complete or not
        Returns:
        A Future that will resolve when both f1 f2 have resolved
